sen.j: 宅部皇子（やかべ の みこ、宣化天皇4年2月10日 (旧暦)（539年3月15日） - 用明天皇2年6月8日 (旧暦)（587年7月18日））は宣化天皇の皇子。
sen.e: Prince Yakabe (March 15, 539 - July 18, 587) was the Imperial prince of Emperor Senka.
Prince Yakabe (March 15, 539 - July 18, 587) was the Imperial prince of Emperor Senka.
Prince Yakabe (March 27, 539 - July 20, 587) was the Imperial prince of Emperor Senka.

sen.j: 皇子についての記述は少ないが、日本書紀には物部守屋に擁立されようとした穴穂部皇子と深く親しかったので殺されたとある。
sen.e: Although not many reports about Prince were kept, "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) said that he was killed because he was very close with Prince Anahobe when MONONOBE no Moriya tried to ascend to the throne.

Although not many reports about Prince were kept, "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) said that he was killed because he was very close with Prince Anahobe when MONONOBE no Moriya tried to ascend to the throne.
sen.cmt: スペース訂正しました。
sen.e: Although not many reports about Prince were kept, "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) said that he was killed because he was very close with Prince Anahobe when MONONOBE no Moriya tried to ascend to the throne.

sen.j: また、物部氏とも深い関係にあり、妃が物部氏の娘だったとも考えられる。
sen.e: Also he had close connection with the Mononobe clan, it is assumed that his wife was a daughter of the Mononobe clan.
Also he had close connection with the Mononobe clan, it is assumed that his wife was a daughter of the Mononobe clan.
Also he had close connection with the Mononobe clan, it is assumed that his wife was a daughter of the Mononobe clan.
